story.author: MrEd528
story.headline: Artificial Intelligence claims that horse puns are the way of the future.
story.subheading: Robots may be on to something

article.p: Recently an AI was asked what the future was going to be like.
Its response, “horse puns,” shocked everyone. Better yet, the AI had absolutely no interference from the sensational online group, Pwnable Pwnies. Seriously.
Pony up, unsaddle your expectations, and hoof up your horse puns today!
